CustomField.formula: IF( Weekday_No__c = 1, "Sunday", IF( Weekday_No__c = 2, "Monday", IF( Weekday_No__c = 3, "Tuesday", IF( Weekday_No__c = 4, "Wednesday", IF( Weekday_No__c = 5, "Thursday", IF( Weekday_No__c = 6, "Friday", IF( Weekday_No__c = 7, "Saturday", "NULL")))))))
CustomField.label: Weekday Name
